procurement_category: Category 7: Information Technology - Goods, Works and Services
short_summary: St Stephen 3rd bridge and Fosterville  POE Installation and testing of cellular booster systems
description: Take action to improve the existing cellular network signal footprint at the St. Stephen 3rd bridge and Fosterville POE with accumulative device numbers. Take action to meet industry enhancement technology and perform all tests associated with cellular boosters, and meeting barcode standards, to meet or exceed each gateway report and arrive at the highest reading called total throughput at designated locations. Extend completed test procedure documents and specifically not uploaded articles//xC_X264<=Y Egypt<=o transformations.
